### 1. First Time Setup:

## ğŸ”§ Troubleshooting:

### App Won't Start:
- Run as Administrator
- Check Windows Defender isn't blocking it
- Ensure you have camera connected

### Browser Doesn't Open:
- Manually open browser and go to: http://localhost:8000
- Wait 60 seconds after starting the app

### Camera Not Working:
- Check browser permissions (click camera icon in address bar)
- Close other apps using the camera
- Try refreshing the browser page

### Performance Issues:
- Close other applications to free up memory
- Ensure good lighting for better detection
- System will automatically switch to demo mode if low memory
